mapper.select: select community_id,community_name from community order by month_times desc OFFSET 0 ROW FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY
select community_id,community_name from community where type_name=#{type_name} order by week_times desc OFFSET 0 ROW FETCH NEXT 10 ROWS ONLY
select count(*) from item_Details where uid=#{uid} and isDeleted=0
select count(*) from item_details_temp where uid=#{uid} and (isOK=#{isOK} or isOK=-#{isOK})
select * from item_details_temp where uid=#{uid} and (isOK=-1 or isOK=1 ) order by create_time desc OFFSET ${pageNumber} ROW FETCH NEXT 6 ROWS ONLY;
select * from item_details_temp where uid=#{uid} and isOK=0 order by create_time desc OFFSET ${pageNumber} ROW FETCH NEXT 6 ROWS ONLY;
select cover_img from item_details where pid=#{pid}
